trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated"></xref>和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound"></xref>的事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>中的项时将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>创建控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is data bound to a source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>中的项时将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件被数据绑定到源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of DataListItemEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: DataListItemEventArgs 实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs>的新实例

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following property is initialized to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 实例时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs>创建此构造函数的调用中，通过以下属性初始化为指定的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object that represents an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref>表示中的项的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the referenced item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 获取所引用的项目中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制何时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are referenced as each item is created or bound to the control.
trans-unit.target: 中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>创建每个项或将其绑定到控件引用控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to programmatically access the referenced item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性以编程方式访问中的引用的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound>引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The referenced item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 中的引用的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制何时引发事件。
